title: Christmas with Nathan: A dark erotic BDSM short story
description: Following Enlightened comes Christmas With Nathan - a sexy seasonal short. It's now three months after the birth of their son William, and time for Nathan and Stella to spend their first Christmas together as a family of three. The trouble is, Nathan hasn’t touched Stella since the birth, and she’s starting to worry that something might be wrong between them. Can Nathan soothe her fears and give Stella a Christmas to remember, or is fatherhood just a step too far for this formerly closed-off Dom?
author: Alice Raine
